reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater dress fits well and looks good with or without a belt, appreciating its high-quality construction and comfortable thick knit fabric.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: This dress is adorable!!! The quality is good too. It also shows off my baby bump wel Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing!
items.body: I love this dress!! The fabric is a very comfortable thick knit without feeling bulky or heavy at all. It is stretchy and form fitting without being tight or clingy. Although it came folded up in a bag, once hung up on a hanger, it was as neat as a pin. I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this dress, but I highly recommend it for just about any occasion. I have it in this lovely maroon color and also in white and black and all are very high quality. For reference: I am 5‚Äô2‚Äù and 97 lbs and size small fit perfectly! You can use the knit belt or add your own (I‚Äôll probably add my own belt and wear boots and tights next time around!) Read more
items.author: Cathy Y.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit great worth the price!
items.body: Fit great and the material feels like it's worth the price!! Super flattering! Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater dress
items.body: It's fairly thick and doesn't feel cheap or too thin. Looks really cute with high boots for the fall. Read more
items.author: Shannon Defin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Matches Description
items.body: Fits exactly as described and extremely comfortable fall sweater dress. Read more
items.author: Anon

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size up at least one, and if you want the seater baggy look then size up 2.
items.body: Saw lots of reviews that it‚Äôs cheap material and not sweater-like. I totally disagree. For one, there are all kinds of sweater materials. This is a light one that is warm but still hugs your body. Who wants a bulky dress that makes you sweat when you are dressing up comfy-sexy? NOT ME. The material is great, and not cheap at all. It‚Äôs more of a sophisticated sweater dress. My surprise is the sizing feedback. I am 5‚Äô4, slim but fit, and 120lbs. I bought a few sizes, and settled on the large. Depending on what look you want, depends on the size. Although the small fit me well, it wasn‚Äôt a comfy fit. It was more a sweater bodycon dress that‚Äôs tight to every curve. I wanted a comfy-sexy look, with off shoulders and some bunching for a more sweater appeal. The large did that for me. Happy with the purchase! Great sweater dress. Read more
items.author: jenna makos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: My second time buying this dress in a different color. Love the fabric. Not see through, perfect for spring, fall or winter. It dresses up nicely. It‚Äôs flattering to my curves. True to size and color. I‚Äôm a 5‚Äô2‚Äù 111 lbs. very comfortable the way the fabric adjust to your body. Not heavy. It looks good with boots or high heels. I just bought the red color and it looks perfect and sexy. Read more
items.author: Sarah McMurray

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holiday Staple!
items.body: A holiday staple for the last few years! Super soft & stretchy. The material is nice and thick - no see through moments when you bend over. üôåüèª Read more
items.author: Jessica Souza

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Aqua, Blue, Peach, Apricot, Black, Camel, Armygreen, Midnightblue, Olive, Red, Navy, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
